name: postgres
description: Fastest full featured PostgreSQL client for Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:deno
scripts.test: npm run test:esm && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:deno
scripts.test:cjs: npm run build:cjs && cd cjs/tests && node index.js && cd ../../
scripts.test:deno: npm run build:deno && cd deno/tests && deno run --unstable --allow-all --unsafely-ignore-certificate-errors index.js && cd ../../

author: Rasmus Porsager <rasmus@porsager.com> (https://www.porsager.com)
